XXbsu007_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasamaye bhagavān sukhāvatyāṃ viharati sma mahatā bodhisattvasaṃghena
XXbsu007_u:2_1: sārdhaṃ - tadyathā avalokiteśvareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena
XXbsu007_u:2_2: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkaṃbhinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_3: kṣitigarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena samantabhadreṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_4: ākāśagarbheṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vajrapāṇinā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_5: sarvabhayahareṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ sarvamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_6: mahāsattvena sarvapuṇyalakṣaṇadhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena candrasūryatrailokyadhāriṇā
XXbsu007_u:2_7: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatīrthamaṅgaladhāriṇā ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
XXbsu007_u:2_8: maṃjuśriyā ca kumārabhūtena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃpramukhairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ / [Śmdv_94]
XXbsu007_u:3: atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu007_u:6: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śatasahasraṃ pradakṣīṇīkṛtya sarvāṃśca tān sukhāvatīnivāsino bodhisattvān mahāsattvān śirasābhivandyaikānte nyaṣīdat /
XXbsu007_u:7_1: śriyaṃ mahādevīṃ dṛṣṭā mahābrahmasvareṇāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat /
XXbsu007_u:8_0: yaḥ kaścidavalokiteśvara rājā vā rājamātro vā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrā
XXbsu007_u:8_1: vā śriyā mahādevyā aṣṭottaraṃ śataṃ vimalaprakhyaṃ nāma stotraṃ dhārayiṣyanti tasya
XXbsu007_u:8_2: rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya viṣaye teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvabhayetyupadravā praśamiṣyanti /
XXbsu007_u:11: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya gṛhe śrīrnivasiṣyati /
XXbsu007_u:12: atha te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta /
XXbsu007_u:14: ye śriyā mahādevyā nāmadheyāni dhārayiṣyanti teṣāmapīmā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu007_u:19: bhūtapūrvamavalokiteśvara atīte 'dhvani ratnasaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau ratnakusumaguṇasāgaravaidūryakanakagirisuvarṇakāṃcanaprabhāsaśrīrnāma tathāgato loke udapādi /
XXbsu007_u:20: tasyāntike śriyā mahādevyā kuśalamūlamavaropitamanyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmantike /
XXbsu007_u:21: imāni ca tathāgatanāmāni tasyāḥ śriyā mahādevyāḥ kuśalamūlavivṛddhisaṃpattikarāṇi /
XXbsu007_u:22_0: sadānubaddhānitāni śriyā mahādevyā yānīha samudḥritāni sarvapāpaharāṇi sarvakilviṣanāśanāni
XXbsu007_u:59: imāni tathāgatanāmāni satkṛtya dhārayitavyāni vācayitavyāni evaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
XXbsu007_u:61: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ śrīmahādevī anāgate 'dhvani śrīmahāratnapratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau tatra śrīmaṇiratnasambhavo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ /
XXbsu007_u:63: [Śmdv_98] tatra ca lokadhātau sa eva tathāgata ālokakaro bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu007_u:64: te ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre svayaṃprabhā bhaviṣyantyaparimitāyuṣaśca /
XXbsu007_u:66: ye ca bodhisattvāstatra buddhakṣetre upapatsyante sarve te padmakarkaṭikāsūpapatsyante /
XXbsu007_u:69_4: om sāvitrī dhātrī mātā caturvedaśrīḥ lakṣmīḥ bhūtamātā jayā vijayā gaṅgā sarvatīrthā
XXbsu007_u:69_5: sarvamaṅgalyā vimalanirmalakaraśrīḥ sarvapāpahantrī nirmadakarā candraśrīḥ sūryaśrīḥ
XXbsu007_u:69_7: padmālayā padmadharā padmāvatī anekaratnāṃśumālā dhanadā śvetā mahāśvetā śvetabhujā
XXbsu007_u:69_9: śatasahasraśirā [Śmdv_99] vividhavicitramaṇimaulidharā surūpā viśvarūpā yaśā mahāyaśā
XXbsu007_u:69_10: saumyā bahujīmūtā pavitrakeśā candrakāntā sūryakāntā śubhā śubhakartrī sarvasattvābhimukhī
XXbsu007_u:69_14: dātrī bhoktrī tejā tejovatī vibhūtīḥ samṛddhiḥ vivṛddhiḥ unnatiḥ dharmaśrīḥ mādhavāśrayā
XXbsu007_u:69_15: kusumanilayā anasūyā puruṣakārāśrayā sarvapavitragātrā maṅgalahastā sarvālakṣmīnāśayitrī
XXbsu007_u:69_17: dyutiḥ pramodabhāgyalolā sarvarṣipavitraśrīḥ sarvaśrīḥ bhavajyeṣṭhottamaśrīḥ sarvakinnarasarvasūryottamaśrīḥ
XXbsu007_u:70: om vilokaya tāraya mocaya mama sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ sarvapuṇyasambhārānāmukhīkuru svāhā /
XXbsu007_u:79: om nigrigrini sarvakāryasādhani sini sini āvāhayāmi
XXbsu007_u:93_0: imāni tānyabhayāvalokiteśvaraśriyā mahādevyā nāmāni sarvakilviṣanāśanāni sarvapāpavidhvaṃsanakarāṇi
XXbsu007_u:94_0: yaḥ kaścidvārayiṣyati imāni tathāgatanāmāni kalyamutthāya śucinā sarvabuddhānāṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ
XXbsu007_u:94_1: dattvā śriyai mahādevyai candanadhūpaṃ dattvā vācayitavyāni sarvaśriyamadhigamiṣyati
XXbsu007_u:96: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
